mapper.select: SELECT id "id" , username "username" , password "password" , email "email" , name "name" , phone "phone" , age "age" , created_date "created_date" , provider "provider" , providerId "providerId" FROM member AND id= #{id}

SELECT id "id" , username "username" , password "password" , email "email" , name "name" , phone "phone" , age "age" , created_date "created_date" , provider "provider" , providerId "providerId" FROM member AND username = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(username, password, age, phone, name, email, provider, providerId) VALUES(#{username}, #{password}, #{age}, #{phone}, #{name}, #{email}, #{provider}, #{providerId})
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET username = #{username}, password = #{password}, age=#{age}, name = #{name}, email = #{email}, phone=#{phone} WHERE id = #{id}
